When the message is included in "Served NR Cell Information" (see TS 36.423 [37]), "Served Cell Information NR" (see TS 38.423 [35]), or "Served Cell Information" (see TS 38.473 [36]), the timing is based on the cell for which the message is included. When the message is included in "NR Neighbour Information" (see TS 36.423 [37]), or "Served Cell Information" (see TS 38.423 [35]), the timing is based on the cell indicated in the "Served NR Cell Information" or "Served Cell Information NR" with which the "NR Neighbour Information" or "Neighbour Information NR" is provided. When the message is included in "CU to DU RRC Information", the timing is based on the cell indicated by SpCell ID with which the message is included. If the field is provided by an NTN cell, the offset (derived from parameter periodicityAndOffset) is based on the assumption that the NTN payload to gNB propagation delay of the cell for which the message is included equals to 0 ms.
MeasTiming.ss-RSSI-Measurement: Provides the configuration which can be used for RSSI measurements of the cell for which the message is included.

MeasurementTimingConfiguration.campOnFirstSSB: Value true indicates that the SSB indicated in the first instance of MeasTiming in the measTiming list can be used for camping and for a PCell configuration (i.e. in spCellConfigCommon of the masterCellGroup) and to indicate which neighbour cell SSB is CD-SSB and which one is NCD-SSB in use.
MeasurementTimingConfiguration.csi-RS-CellMobility: Indicates the CSI-RS configuration of the cell for which this message is included. The timing of the CSI-RS resources is based on the SSB indicated by refSSBFreq.
MeasurementTimingConfiguration.csi-RS-SubcarrierSpacing: Indicates the subcarrier spacing of the CSI-RS resources included in csi-rs-CellMobility.
MeasurementTimingConfiguration.measTiming: A list of SMTC information, SSB RSSI measurement information and associated NR frequency exchanged via EN-DC X2 Setup, EN-DC Configuration Update, Xn Setup and NG-RAN Node Configuration Update procedures, or F1 messages between gNB DU and gNB CU.
MeasurementTimingConfiguration.physCellId: Physical Cell Identity of the SSB on the ARFCN indicated by carrierFreq.
MeasurementTimingConfiguration.psCellOnlyOnFirstSSB: Value true indicates that only the SSB indicated in the first instance of MeasTiming in the measTiming list can be used for a PSCell configuration (i.e. in spCellConfigCommon of the secondaryCellGroup).
MeasurementTimingConfiguration.ssb-ToMeasure: The set of SS blocks to be measured within the SMTC measurement duration (see TS 38.215 [9]).

UERadioPagingInformation.supportedBandList: Indicates the UE supported NR frequency bands which are derived by the gNB from UE-NR-Capability.
UERadioPagingInformation.dl-SchedulingOffset-PDSCH-TypeA-FDD-FR1: Indicates whether the UE supports DL scheduling slot offset (K0) greater than 0 for PDSCH mapping type A in FDD FR1.
UERadioPagingInformation.dl-SchedulingOffset-PDSCH-TypeA-FDD-FR2-: Indicates whether the UE supports DL scheduling slot offset (K0) greater than 0 for PDSCH mapping type A in FDD FR2-NTN.
UERadioPagingInformation.dl-SchedulingOffset-PDSCH-TypeA-TDD-FR1: Indicates whether the UE supports DL scheduling slot offset (K0) greater than 0 for PDSCH mapping type A in TDD FR1.
UERadioPagingInformation.dl-SchedulingOffset-PDSCH-TypeA-TDD-FR2: Indicates whether the UE supports DL scheduling slot offset (K0) greater than 0 for PDSCH mapping type A in TDD FR2.
UERadioPagingInformation.dl-SchedulingOffset-PDSCH-TypeB-FDD-FR1: Indicates whether the UE supports DL scheduling slot offset (K0) greater than 0 for PDSCH mapping type B in FDD FR1.
UERadioPagingInformation.dl-SchedulingOffset-PDSCH-TypeB-FDD-FR2-: Indicates whether the UE supports DL scheduling slot offset (K0) greater than 0 for PDSCH mapping type B in FDD FR2-NTN.
UERadioPagingInformation.dl-SchedulingOffset-PDSCH-TypeB-TDD-FR1: Indicates whether the UE supports DL scheduling slot offset (K0) greater than 0 for PDSCH mapping type B in TDD FR1.
UERadioPagingInformation.dl-SchedulingOffset-PDSCH-TypeB-TDD-FR2: Indicates whether the UE supports DL scheduling slot offset (K0) greater than 0 for PDSCH mapping type B in TDD FR2.
UERadioPagingInformation.halfDuplexFDD-TypeA-RedCap: Indicates whether the (e)RedCap UE only supports half-duplex operation for FDD in the indicated band(s).
UERadioPagingInformation.inactiveStatePO-Determination: Indicates whether the UE supports to use the same i_s to determine PO in RRC_INACTIVE state as in RRC_IDLE state.
UERadioPagingInformation.numberOfRxERedCap: Indicates the number of Rx branches supported by an eRedCap UE.
UERadioPagingInformation.numberOfRxRedCap: Indicates the number of Rx branches supported by a RedCap UE.
UERadioPagingInformation.supportOf2RxXR: Indicates whether the UE is a 2Rx XR UE.
UERadioPagingInformation.ue-RadioPagingInfo: The field is used to transfer UE capability information used for paging. The gNB generates the ue-RadioPagingInfo and the contained UE capability information is absent when not supported by the UE.

UERadioAccessCapabilityInformation-IEs.ue-RadioAccessCapabilityInfo: Including NR, MR-DC, E-UTRA radio access capabilities. A gNB that retrieves MRDC related capability containers ensures that the set of included MRDC containers is consistent w.r.t. the feature set related information.

L1-MeasConfigNRDC.maxCellsL1-MeasInterFreqSCG: Indicates the maximum number of RRC configured LTM candidate cells for intra- and inter-frequency L1 measurement.
L1-MeasConfigNRDC.maxCellsL1-MeasIntraFreqSCG: Indicates the maximum number of RRC configured LTM candidate cells for intra-frequency L1 measurement.
L1-MeasConfigNRDC.maxCellsL1-MeasNoGapSCG: Indicates the maximum number of neighbour cells UE can measure per frequency layer for intra-frequency or inter-frequency L1 measurements without measurement gaps.
L1-MeasConfigNRDC.maxCellsL1-MeasWithGapSCG: Indicates the maximum number of neighbour cells UE can measure per frequency layer for inter-frequency L1 measurements with measurement gaps.
L1-MeasConfigNRDC.maxL1-MeasNoGapSCG: Indicates the maximum number of frequency layers UE can measure for intra- and inter-frequency L1 measurements without measurement gaps.
L1-MeasConfigNRDC.maxL1-MeasWithGapSCG: Indicates the maximum number of frequency layers UE can measure for inter-frequency L1 measurements with measurement gaps.
L1-MeasConfigNRDC.maxReportConfigsAperiodic: Indicates the maximum number of aperiodic LTM CSI report configurations.
L1-MeasConfigNRDC.maxReportConfigsPeriodic: Indicates the maximum number of periodic LTM CSI report configurations.
L1-MeasConfigNRDC.maxReportConfigsSemiPersistent: Indicates the maximum number of semi-persistent LTM CSI report configurations.
L1-MeasConfigNRDC.maxSSBsL1-MeasNoGapSCG: Indicates the maximum number of SSB resources UE can measure per frequency layer for intra-frequency or inter-frequency L1 measurements without measurement gaps. If the field maxSSBsL1-MeasNoGapSCGExt is included, the field maxSSBsL1-MeasNoGapSCG is not present.
L1-MeasConfigNRDC.maxSSBsL1-MeasWithGapSCG: Indicates the maximum number of SSB resources UE can measure per frequency layer for inter-frequency L1 measurements with measurement gaps.
L1-MeasConfigNRDC.maxTotalCellsL1-MeasNoGapSCG: Indicates the maximum total number of cells, including serving cells and neighboring cells, across all frequency layers of intra-frequency and inter-frequency L1 measurements, UE can measure without measurement gaps.
L1-MeasConfigNRDC.maxTotalSSBsL1-MeasNoGapSCG: Indicates the maximum total number of SSB resources, including serving cells and neighboring cells, across all frequency layers of intra-frequency and inter-frequency L1 measurements, UE can measure without measurement gaps.

LTM-ResourceConfigNRDC.maxActivatedDL-TCI-States: Indicates the maximum number of MAC CE activated LTM DL TCI states.
LTM-ResourceConfigNRDC.maxActivatedJointTCI-States: Indicates the maximum number of MAC CE activated joint LTM TCI states.
LTM-ResourceConfigNRDC.maxActivatedUL-TCI-States: Indicates the maximum number of MAC CE activated LTM UL TCI states.
LTM-ResourceConfigNRDC.maxCellsJointTCI: Indicates the maximum number of configured cells for joint LTM TCI state(s).
LTM-ResourceConfigNRDC.maxCellsTA-Meas: Indicates the maximum number of candidate cells for TA acquisition based on PDCCH ordered CFRA procedure before receiving cell switch command MAC-CE.
LTM-ResourceConfigNRDC.maxCellsTCI: Indicates the maximum number of configured cells for separate DL/UL LTM TCI state(s).
LTM-ResourceConfigNRDC.maxConfigCells: Indicates the maximum number of LTM candidate configuration(s) for which the UE can perform early ASN.1 decoding and validity check.
LTM-ResourceConfigNRDC.maxConfigDL-TCI-States: Indicates the maximum number of configured separate DL LTM TCI state(s).
LTM-ResourceConfigNRDC.maxConfigJointTCI-States: Indicates the maximum number of configured joint LTM TCI state(s).
LTM-ResourceConfigNRDC.maxConfigUL-TCI-States: Indicates the maximum number of configured separate UL LTM TCI state(s).
LTM-ResourceConfigNRDC.maxStoredConfigCells: Indicates the maximum number of serving cell(s) and candidate cell(s), including serving SpCell(s), serving SCell(s) in SCG, SpCell in LTM candidate configurations and SCell(s) in LTM candidate configurations for SCG.

ResourceConfigNRDC.fr1-ResourceConfig, fr2-ResourceConfig: Indicates the maximum number of resources that SCG is allowed to configure for FR1/FR2, respectively.
ResourceConfigNRDC.maxNumberResAcrossCC-AcrossFR: Indicates the maximum number of configured CSI-RS resources. Corresponds to the UE capability maxNumberResAcrossCC-AcrossFR-r16 in maxTotalResourcesForAcrossFreqRanges-r16.

ResourceConfigPerFR.bm-MaxNumberAperiodicCSI-RS-Resource: Indicates the maximum number of aperiodic CSI-RS resources that the SCG is allowed to configure for the UE to measure L1-RSRP. Corresponds to the UE capability maxNumberAperiodicCSI-RS-Resource in beamManagementSSB-CSI-RS.
ResourceConfigPerFR.bm-MaxNumberCSI-RS-Resource: Indicates the maximum total number of NZP-CSI-RS resources that can be configured for the UE to measure L1-RSRP. Corresponds to the UE capability maxNumberCSI-RS-Resource in beamManagementSSB-CSI-RS.
ResourceConfigPerFR.cg-MaxNumberConfigsAllCC: Indicates the maximum number of active configured grant configurations. Corresponds to the UE capability maxNumberConfigsAllCC-r16 in activeConfiguredGrant-r16.
ResourceConfigPerFR.maxNumberCSI-RS-BFD: Indicates the maximal number of different CSI-RS resources for the UE to monitor PDCCH quality. Corresponds to the UE capability maxNumberCSI-RS-BFD.
ResourceConfigPerFR.maxNumberCSI-RS-SSB-CBD: Indicates the maximal number of different CSI-RS (and/or SSB) resources for new beam identifications. Corresponds to the UE capability maxNumberCSI-RS-SSB-CBD.
ResourceConfigPerFR.maxNumberSSB-BFD: Indicates the maximal number of different SSBs for the UE to monitor PDCCH quality. Corresponds to the UE capability maxNumberSSB-BFD.
ResourceConfigPerFR.sps-MaxNumberConfigsAllCC: Indicates the maximum number of SPS configurations. Corresponds to the UE capability maxNumberConfigsAllCC-r16 in sps-r16.
ResourceConfigPerFR.trs-MaxConfResourceSetsAllCC: Indicates the maximum configured CSI-RS for tracking (i.e. TRS) resource sets. Corresponds to the UE capability maxConfiguredResourceSetsAllCC in csi-RS-ForTracking.

conditional_presence_flags.NR: This field is optionally present, need OR, for NR access. Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Segmentation: This field is optionally present, need OP, if lpp-message-segmentation-req has been received from the location server with bit 1 (targetToServer) set to value 1. The field shall be omitted if lppmessagesegmentation-req has not been received in this location session, or has been received with bit 1 (targetToServer) set to value 0.
conditional_presence_flags.EUTRA: The field is mandatory present for E-UTRA or NB-IoT access. The field shall be omitted for non-EUTRA and non-NB-IoT user plane support.
conditional_presence_flags.PerADreq: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic assistance data delivery. Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.PerAD: The field is mandatory present in a periodic assistance data delivery session. Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.ECID: The field is optionally present, need ON, if E-CID or NR E-CID is requested. Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.AzElFine: The field is mandatory present if the angles where this IE is used are provided with 0.1 degrees resolution; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Rep: The field is mandatory present, if dl-PRS-ResourceRepetitionFactor is present. Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSame: The field is optionally present, need OP. If the field is absent, the indicated nr-DL-PRS-PrioResourceID belongs to the same DL-PRS Resource Set as the nr-DL-PRS-ResourceID.
conditional_presence_flags.dl-TDOA: The field is optionally present, need ON, if the field is included in IE NR-DL-TDOA-ProvideAssistanceData. Otherwise, it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.pPRU: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic delivery of NR-PRU-DL-Info; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pIntegrity: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic delivery of NR-IntegrityServiceAlert; otherwise, it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Integrity1: The field is mandatory present if SSR-GriddedCorrectionIntegrityParameters is present; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Integrity2: The field is mandatory present if troposphereRangeErrorCorrelationTime is present; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Integrity3: The field is optionally present, need OR, if nr-RTD-Info is present and nr-IntegrityRTD-InfoBounds is present in IE NR-RTD-Info; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Integrity4: The field is optionally present, need OR, if nr-TRP-BeamAntennaInfo is present and nr-IntegrityBeamPowerBounds is present in IE NR-TRP-BeamAntennaInfo; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Az: The field is mandatory present if the field elevation is absent; otherwise it is optionally present, need ON.
conditional_presence_flags.AzOpt: The field is optionally present, need ON, when azimuth is present; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.El: The field is mandatory present if the field azimuth is absent; otherwise it is optionally present, need ON.
conditional_presence_flags.ElOpt: The field is optionally present, need ON, when elevation is present; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsPrev: The field is mandatory present in the first entry of the NR-TRP-LocationInfoPerFreqLayer in the nr-TRP-LocationInfo list; otherwise it is optionally present, need OP.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsServ0: This field is absent if earfcnRef-v9a0 is present. Otherwise, the field is mandatory present if the EARFCN of the OTDOA assistance data reference cell is not the same as the EARFCN of the target devices' current primary cell.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsServ1: This field is mandatory present if the carrier frequency of the NB-IoT assistance data reference cell is not the same as the carrier frequency of the target devices' current serving NB-IoT cell. Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsServ2: This field is mandatory present, if NPRS configuration Part B only is configured on the NB-IoT assistance data reference cell, and if the repetition number of SIB1-NB of the NBIoT assistance data reference cell is not the same as the repetition number of SIB1NB of the target devices′ current serving NB-IoT cell. Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.PRS: This field is optionally present, Need R, when configuring gap pattern to UE for measurements of DL-PRS configured via LPP (TS 37.355 [49]). Otherwise, it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.CRS: The field is optionally present, need ON, if prsInfo is present. Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsServ3: The field is mandatory present if the downlink bandwidth configuration of the assistance data reference cell is not the same as the downlink bandwidth configuration of the target devices' current primary cell and if PRS frequency hopping is used in the assistance data reference cell (TS 36.211 [16]); otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.FineOffset: The field is optionally present, need ON, if nr-LTE-SFN-Offset is present. Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.sf-add: The field is mandatory present if the numDL-Frames field has the value 'sf-add'; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Occ-Grp: The field is mandatory present if a PRS occasion group is configured; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.PRS-FH: The field is mandatory present if frequency hopping is used for PRS; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NotsameAsRef0: The field is absent if earfcn-v9a0 is present. If earfcn-v9a0 is not present, the field is mandatory present if the EARFCN is not the same as for the assistance data reference cell; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NotsameAsRef1: The field is mandatory present if the cyclic prefix length is not the same as for the assistance data reference cell; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NotsameAsRef2: The field is mandatory present if the first PRS configuration is not the same as for the assistance data reference cell; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NotsameAsRef3: The field is mandatory present if the antenna port configuration is not the same as for the assistance data reference cell; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NotsameAsRef4: The field is mandatory present if the slot timing is not the same as for the assistance data reference cell; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsRef5: The field is mandatory present if the slot timing is not the same as for the NB-IoT assistance data reference cell; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.InterFreq: The field is optionally present, need OP, if the EARFCN is not the same as for the assistance data reference cell; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.TBS: The field is mandatory present if the OTDOA-NeighbourCellInfoElement is provided for a PRS-only TP; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsRef6: The field is mandatory present if the frame timing is not the same as for the NB-IoT assistance data reference cell; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsRef7: The field is mandatory present if any instance of the additional PRS configurations of addPRSconfigNeighbour is not the same as the corresponding instance of the additional PRS configuration of the addPRSconfigRef for the assistance data reference cell; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NoPRS-AD1: This field is mandatory present if the OTDOA-NeighbourCellInfoList IE is not included in OTDOAProvideAssistanceData, or if the OTDOA-NeighbourCellInfoList IE is included in OTDOAProvideAssistanceData and the narrowband physical layer cell identity of this cell is not the same as the physical cell identity of the corresponding cell (as indicated by prsNeighbourCellIndex) in OTDOANeighbourCellInfoList IE.
conditional_presence_flags.NoPRS-AD2: This field is optionally present, need ON, if the OTDOA-NeighbourCellInfoList IE is not included in OTDOAProvideAssistanceData, or if the OTDOA-NeighbourCellInfoList IE is included in OTDOAProvideAssistanceData and the global cell identity of this cell is not the same as for the corresponding cell (as indicated by prsNeighbourCellIndex) in OTDOANeighbourCellInfoList IE.
conditional_presence_flags.Inband: This field is mandatory present, if the NPRS is configured within the LTE spectrum allocation (inband deployment). Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NoPRS-AD3: This field is mandatory present if the OTDOA-NeighbourCellInfoList IE is not included in OTDOAProvideAssistanceData, or if the OTDOA-NeighbourCellInfoList IE is included in OTDOAProvideAssistanceData and prsNeighbourCellIndex is absent for this cell.
conditional_presence_flags.NPRS-Type1: The field is mandatory present if Type 1 narrowband positioning reference signals are available in the assistance data reference cell (TS 36.211 [16]); otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NPRS-Type2: The field is mandatory present if Type 2 narrowband positioning reference signals are available in the assistance data reference cell (TS 36.211 [16]); otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Standalone/Guardband: This field is mandatory present, if the NPRS is configured in standalone or guardband operation mode. Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NPRS-ID: The field is mandatory present, if the NPRS is generated based on the NPRS-ID (TS 36.211 [16]), different from the PCI. Otherwise the field is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.MutingA: The field is mandatory present, if muting is used for the NPRS Part A or Part A TDD configuration. Otherwise the field is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.PartA: The field is mandatory present, if NPRS is configured based on a bitmap of subframes which are not NB-IoT DL subframes (i.e., invalid DL subframes) (Part A configuration). Otherwise the field is not present. This field is not applicable for NB-IoT operating in TDD mode.
conditional_presence_flags.MutingB: The field is mandatory present, if muting is used for the NPRS Part B configuration. Otherwise the field is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.PartB: The field is mandatory present, if NPRS is configured based on a NPRS period, a NPRS subframe offset, and a number of consecutive NPRS downlink subframes per positioning occasion (Part B configuration). Otherwise the field is not present.If NPRS configuration Part A and Part B are both configured, then a subframe contains NPRS if both configurations indicate that it contains NPRS.
conditional_presence_flags.PartA-TDD: The field is mandatory present, if NPRS is configured for NB-IoT operating in TDD mode and if NPRS is configured based on a bitmap of subframes which are not NB-IoT DL subframes (i.e., invalid DL subframes) (Part A TDD configuration). Otherwise the field is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.SIB1-TDD: The field is mandatory present, if NPRS is configured for NB-IoT operating in TDD mode and if SIB1-NB is transmitted on this carrier frequency. Otherwise the field is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsRef1: The field is absent if the corresponding earfcnRef is present. Otherwise, the target device shall include this field if the EARFCN of the RSTD reference cell is not the same as the EARFCN of the assistance data reference cell provided in the OTDOA assistance data.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsRef2: The target device shall include this field if the EARFCN of this neighbour cell is not the same as the earfcnRef for the RSTD reference cell.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsRef3: The field is absent if the corresponding earfcnNeighbour is present. Otherwise, the target device shall include this field if the EARFCN of this neighbour cell is not the same as the earfcnRef for the RSTD reference cell.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsRef4: The field is mandatory present, if the NPRS configuration is not the same as for the NBIoT assistance data reference cell; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.PRS-AD: This field is optionally present, need OP, if the OTDOA-NeighbourCellInfoList IE is included in OTDOAProvideAssistanceData; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsRef0: The target device shall include this field if the EARFCN of the RSTD reference cell is not the same as the EARFCN of the assistance data reference cell provided in the OTDOA assistance data.
conditional_presence_flags.ProvidedByServer0: The target device shall include this field if a tpId for this transmission point is included in the OTDOA-ProvideAssistanceData. Otherwise the field is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.ProvidedByServer1: The target device shall include this field if a prsID for this transmission point is included in the OTDOA-ProvideAssistanceData. Otherwise the field is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.ProvidedByServer2: The target device shall include this field if an nprsID for this cell is included in the OTDOA-ProvideAssistanceData and if this cell is a NB-IoT only cell (without associated LTE PRS cell). Otherwise the field is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.NB-IoT: The field is mandatory present if the measured cell is a NB-IoT cell. Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.H-SFN: The target device shall include this field if it was able to determine a hyper SFN of the RSTD reference cell.
conditional_presence_flags.CtrTrans: The field is mandatory present in the control transaction of a periodic assistance data delivery session as described in clauses 5.2.1a and 5.2.2a for UE-based NR DL-AoD; otherwise, it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.RTK: The field is mandatory present if the IE GNSS-RTK-Observations is included in IE GNSSGenericAssistData; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.GNSSIDSBAS: The field is mandatory present if the GNSSID = sbas; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.GNSSIDBDS: The field may be present if the GNSSID = bds; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.GNSS-ID-GLO: The field is optionally present, need ON, if the GNSS ID = glonass; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.GNSS-ID-NAVIC: The field is optionally present, need ON, if the GNSSID = navic; otherwise it is not present
conditional_presence_flags.noFTA: The field may be present if gnss-ReferenceTimeForCells is absent; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.gnss-TimeID-glonass: The field may be present if gnss-TimeID=`glonass′; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.gnss-TimeID-gps: The field may be present if gnss-TimeID=`gps′; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.EARFCN-max: The field is mandatory present if the corresponding arfcnEUTRA (i.e. without suffix) is set to maxEARFCN. Otherwise the field is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.GNSSsynch: The field is present and set to 0 if NetworkTime is synchronized to gnss-SystemTime; otherwise the field is optionally present, need OR.
conditional_presence_flags.NP: The field is optionally present, need ON, if the referenceStationIndicator has the value ′non-physical′; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.3D: This field is mandatory present if a 3D grid is provided; otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.ClockModel: This field is mandatory present if gnss-ClockModel Model5 is not included; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameForAllSV: This field is optionally present, need ON, if the tOA is not the same for all SVs; otherwise, it is not present and the toa is provided in GNSS-Almanac.
conditional_presence_flags.SV-ID: This field is mandatory present if SV-ID is between 0 and 63; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.GLONASS-M: The field is mandatory present if GLONASS-M satellites are present in the current GLONASS constellation; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.FDMA: The field is mandatory present if the GLONASS SV indicated by svID broadcasts FDMA signals; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Tropo: The field is mandatory present if tropospericDelayCorrection is included in gridList. Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.CommonADReq: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-CommonAssistData; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.GenADReq: This field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-GenericAssistData for one or more specific GNSS; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.PerADReq: This field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic NR assistance data delivery.
conditional_presence_flags.RefTimeReq: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-ReferenceTime; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.RefLocReq: This field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-ReferenceLocation; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.IonoModReq: This field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-IonosphericModel; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.EOPReq: This field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-EarthOrientationParameters; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.ARPReq: This field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSSRTKReferenceStationInfo; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.AuxARPReq: This field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSSRTKAuxiliaryStationData; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.PointsReq: This field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-SSR-CorrectionPoints; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.IntServiceReq: This field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-Integrity-ServiceParameters; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.IntAlertReq: This field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-Integrity-ServiceAlert; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.IODUpdateReq: This field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-SSR-IOD-Update; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.TimeModReq: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-TimeModelList; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.DGNSS-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-DifferentialCorrections; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NavModReq: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-NavigationModel; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.RTIReq: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-RealTimeIntegrity; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.DataBitsReq: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-DataBitAssistance; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.AcquAssistReq: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-AcquisitionAssistance; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.AlmanacReq: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-Almanac; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.UTCModReq: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-UTCModel; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.AuxInfoReq: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-AuxiliaryInformation; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.DBDS-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests BDS-DifferentialCorrections; otherwise it is not present. This field may only be present if gnss-ID indicates 'bds'.
conditional_presence_flags.BDS-GridModReq: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests BDS-GridModel; otherwise it is not present. This field may only be present if gnss-ID indicates 'bds'.
conditional_presence_flags.RTK-OSR-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-RTK-Observations; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.GLO-CPB-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GLO-RTK-BiasInformation; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.MAC-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSSRTKMACCorrectionDifferences; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Res-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-RTK-Residuals; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.FKP-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-RTK-FKP-Gradients; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.OC-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-SSR-OrbitCorrections; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.CC-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-SSR-ClockCorrections; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.CB-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-SSR-CodeBias; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.URA-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-SSR-URA; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.PB-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-SSR-PhaseBias; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.STEC-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-SSR-STEC-Correction; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Grid-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSSSSRGriddedCorrection; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.DNavIC-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests NavIC-DifferentialCorrections; otherwise it is not present. This field may only be present if the gnss-ID indicates 'navic'.
conditional_presence_flags.NavIC-GridModReq: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests NavIC-GridModel; otherwise it is not present. This field may only be present if the gnss-ID indicates 'navic'.
conditional_presence_flags.OC2-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-SSR-OrbitCorrectionsSet2; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.CC2-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-SSR-ClockCorrectionsSet2; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.URA2-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-SSR-URA-Set2; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.LOS-GridReq: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-LOS-NLOS-GriddedIndications; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.SatPCV-Req: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests GNSS-SSR-SatellitePCVResiduals; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pOSR: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GNSSRTKObservations; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pCPB: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GLORTKBiasInformation; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pMAC: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GNSSRTKMACCorrectionDifferences; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pRes: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GNSSRTKResiduals; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pFKP: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GNSSRTKFKPGradients; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pOC: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GNSSSSROrbitCorrections; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pCC: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GNSSSSRClockCorrections; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pCB: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GNSSSSRCodeBias; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pURA: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GNSSSSRURA; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pPB: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GNSSSSRPhaseBias; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pSTEC: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GNSSSSRSTECCorrection; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pGrid: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GNSSSSRGriddedCorrection; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pDNU: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GNSS-Integrity-ServiceAlert; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pOC2: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GNSSSSROrbitCorrectionsSet2; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pCC2: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GNSSSSRClockCorrectionsSet2; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pURA2: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GNSSSSRURA-Set2; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.pPCV: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests periodic GNSS SSR IOD-Update; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.gps: The field is mandatory present if gnss-TimeReqPrefList includes a GNSS-ID= 'gps'; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.glonass: The field is mandatory present if gnss-TimeReqPrefList includes a GNSS-ID= 'glonass'; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.klobuchar: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests klobucharModel; otherwise it is not present. The BIT STRING defines the dataID requested, defined in IE KlobucharModelParameter.
conditional_presence_flags.nequick: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests neQuickModel; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.klobuchar2: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests klobucharModel2; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.neQuick2: The field is mandatory present if the target device requests neQuickModel2; otherwise it is not present. The given neQuickModel2 parameters are applied as defined in [55].
conditional_presence_flags.orbitModelID-2: The field is mandatory present if orbitModelID-PrefList is absent or includes a Model-ID = '2'; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Relative: This field is mandatory present if a relative position is included in the request. It is absent if the field gridPointsSetID-Req is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.UEB: The field is optionally present, need ON, for UE based NR DL-AoD; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.fta: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports fine time assistance in GNSSReferenceTime IE; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.RefTimeSup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-ReferenceTime; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.RefLocSup: This field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-ReferenceLocation; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.IonoModSup: This field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-IonosphericModel; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.EOPSup: This field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-EarthOrientationParameters; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.ARPSup: This field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSSRTKReferenceStationInfo; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.AuxARPSup: This field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSSRTKAuxiliaryStationData; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.IntServiceSup: This field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-Integrity-ServiceParameters; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.IntAlertSup: This field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-Integrity-ServiceAlert; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.IODUpdateSup: This field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS SSR-IOD-Update; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.TimeModSup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-TimeModelList; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.DGNSS-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-DifferentialCorrections; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NavModSup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-NavigationModel; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.RTISup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-RealTimeIntegrity; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.DataBitsSup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-DataBitAssistance; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.AcquAssistSup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-AcquisitionAssistance; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.AlmanacSup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-Almanac; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.UTCModSup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-UTC-Model; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.AuxInfoSup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-AuxiliaryInformation; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.DBDS-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports BDS-DifferentialCorrections; otherwise it is not present. This field may only be present if gnss-ID indicates 'bds'.
conditional_presence_flags.BDS-GridModSup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports BDS-GridModel; otherwise it is not present. This field may only be present if gnss-ID indicates 'bds'.
conditional_presence_flags.RTK-OSR-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-RTK-Observations; otherwise it is not present. Note, support for GNSS-RTK-Observations implies support for GNSS-RTK-CommonObservationInfo as well.
conditional_presence_flags.GLO-CPB-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GLORTKBiasInformation; otherwise it is not present. This field may only be present if gnss-ID indicates 'glonass'.
conditional_presence_flags.MAC-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSSRTKMACCorrectionDifferences; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Res-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSSRTKResiduals; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.FKP-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSSRTKFKPGradients; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.OC-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSSSSROrbitCorrections; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.CC-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSSSSRClockCorrections; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.CB-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSSSSRCodeBias; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.URA-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-SSR-URA; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.PB-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-SSR-PhaseBias; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.STEC-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-SSR-STEC-Correction; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Grid-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSSSSRGriddedCorrection; otherwise it is not present. Note, support for GNSSSSRGriddedCorrection implies support for GNSS-SSR-CorrectionPoints as well.
conditional_presence_flags.DNavIC-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports NavIC-DifferentialCorrections; otherwise it is not present. This field may only be present if the gnss-ID indicates 'navic'.
conditional_presence_flags.NavIC-GridModSup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports NavIC-GridModel; otherwise it is not present. This field may only be present if the gnss-ID indicates 'navic'.
conditional_presence_flags.OC2-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSSSSROrbitCorrectionsSet2; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.CC2-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSSSSRClockCorrectionsSet2; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.URA2-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-SSR-URA-Set2; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.LOS-NLOS-Grid-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-LOS-NLOS-GriddedIndications; otherwise it is not present. Support for GNSS-LOS-NLOS-GriddedIndications implies support for GNSS-LOS-NLOS-GridPoints.
conditional_presence_flags.SatPCV-Sup: The field is mandatory present if the target device supports GNSS-SSR-SatellitePCVResiduals; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.MBS: The field is mandatory present if the TBS-MeasurementInformation is provided for an MBS system; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Barometer: The field is mandatory present if the Sensor-MeasurementInformation is provided for barometric pressure; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsPrev1: The field is mandatory present in the first element of the bt-BeaconInfoList list; otherwise if not present, the bt-LCS-GCS-TranslationParameter of this element is the same as the bt-LCS-GCS-TranslationParameter of the previous element in the bt-BeaconInfoList list.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsPrev2: The field is mandatory present in the first element of the bt-BeaconInfoList list; otherwise if not present, the bt-antArrayConfig of this element is the same as the bt-antArrayConfig of the previous element in the bt-BeaconInfoList list.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsPrev3: The field is mandatory present in the first element of the bt-BeaconInfoList list; otherwise if not present, the bt-antElementList of this element is the same as the bt-antElementList of the previous element in the bt-BeaconInfoList list.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsPrev4: The field is mandatory present in the first element of the bt-BeaconInfoList list; otherwise if not present, the bt-antSwitchingPattern of this element is the same as the bt-antSwitchingPattern of the previous element in the bt-BeaconInfoList list.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSameAsPrev5: The field is mandatory present in the first element of the bt-BeaconInfoList list; otherwise if not present, the bt-AoDTransmConfig of this element is the same as the bt-AoDTransmConfig of the previous element in the bt-BeaconInfoList list.
conditional_presence_flags.batchUEA: The field is optionally present if the field nr-Multi-RTT-SignalMeasurementInformation is absent; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.batchUEB: The field is optionally present if the field nr-dl-AoD-LocationInformation is absent; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.UERxTEG: The field is optionally present, need OP, if the field nr-UE-Rx-TEG-ID is present; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.batch1: The field is mandatory present if the field nr-DL-AIML-LocationInformationInstances is present in IE NR-DL-AIML-ProvideLocationInformation; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.batch2: The field is optionally present, need ON, if the field nr-DL-AIML-LocationInformationInstances is present in IE NR-DL-AIML-ProvideLocationInformation; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.UEA: The field is optionally present, need ON, for UE-assisted NR DL-AoD; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.rsrp: The field is mandatory present if the field nr-DL-PRS-FirstPathRSRP-ResultDiff-r17 is absent; otherwise it is optionally present, need ON.
conditional_presence_flags.rsrpp: The field is mandatory present if the field nr-DL-PRS-RSRP-ResultDiff-r17 is absent; otherwise it is optionally present, need ON.
conditional_presence_flags.Case2-3: The field is mandatory present if the IE NR-UE-RxTx-TEG-Info is provided for choice's case2 and case3. Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.TEGCase3: The field is optionally present, need OP, if the IE NR-UE-RxTx-TEG-Info is provided for choice case3. Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.TEGCase2-3: The field is optionally present, need OP, if the IE NR-UE-RxTx-TEG-Info is provided for choice's case2 and case3. Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.TEGCase1-2: The field is optionally present, need OP, if the IE NR-UE-RxTx-TEG-Info is provided for choice's case1 and case2. Otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.batch: The field is optionally present if the field nr-DL-AIML-LocationInformation is absent; otherwise it is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.ClockQualityDetailsLevel: Field eventID-TSS is mandatory present if clockQualityDetailsLevel is present. Otherwise, the field is optionally present, Need M.
conditional_presence_flags.HO-ToEPCUTRAN: This field is mandatory present in case of inter system handover to "EPC" or "FDD UTRAN". Otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.L2RemoteUE: For L2 U2N Remote UE, the field is optionally present, Need M. Otherwise, it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.nonHO: The field is absent in case of reconfiguration with sync within NR or to NR; otherwise it is optionally present, need N.
conditional_presence_flags.securityNASC: This field is mandatory present in case of inter system handover. Otherwise the field is optionally present, need N.
conditional_presence_flags.MasterKeyChange: This field is mandatory present in case masterCellGroup includes ReconfigurationWithSync and RadioBearerConfig includes SecurityConfig with SecurityAlgorithmConfig, indicating a change of the AS security algorithms associated to the master key. If ReconfigurationWithSync is included for other cases, this field is optionally present, need N. If ReconfigurationWithSync is part of an RRCReconfiguration message within an LTM-Config IE associated with the MCG, the field is absent. Otherwise the field is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.FullConfig: The field is mandatory present in case of inter-system handover from E-UTRA/EPC to NR. It is optionally present, Need N, during a reconfiguration with sync which is not related to an LTM cell switch or subsequent CPAC, and also in first reconfiguration after reestablishment; or for intra-system handover from E-UTRA/5GC to NR. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.SCG: This field is optionally present, need M, in an RRCReconfiguration message not within mrdc-SecondaryCellGroup and received, either via SRB3 within DLInformationTransferMRDC or via SRB1. Otherwise, it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.PagingRelay: For L2 U2N Relay UE, the field is optionally present, Need N. Otherwise, it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.RANPaging: This field is optionally present, Need R, if the UE is configured with IDLE eDRX, see TS 24.501 [23]; otherwise the field is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.Redirection2: The field is optionally present, Need R, if redirectedCarrierInfo is included; otherwise the field is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.RestoreSCG: The field is mandatory present if restoreSCG is included. It is optionally present, Need M, otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.2RxXR: This field is mandatory present if cellBarred2RxXR is present, otherwise it is absent, Need R.
conditional_presence_flags.EDRX-RC: The field is optionally present, Need R, in a cell that enables eDRX-AllowedIdle, otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.EM-Barring: The field is optionally present, Need R, in a cell that supports (e)RedCap or 2Rx XR UEs, otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.MINT: The field is optionally present, Need R, in a cell that provides a configuration for disaster roaming, otherwise it is absent, Need R.
conditional_presence_flags.MT-SDT1: This field is optionally present, Need S, in a cell that supports MT-SDT if sdt-ConfigCommon-r17 is not present, otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.MT-SDT2: This field is mandatory present in a cell that supports MT-SDT if sdt-ConfigCommon-r17 is not present, otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.NTN: The field is optionally present, Need S, in a cell where cellBarredNTN is included with value notBarred, otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.Standalone: The field is mandatory present in a cell that supports standalone operation, otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.HSDN: The field is optionally present, Need R, if speedStateReselectionPars is present; otherwise the field is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.SharedSpectrum: This field is mandatory present if this cell operates with shared spectrum channel access in FR1. Otherwise, it is absent, Need R.
conditional_presence_flags.SharedSpectrum2: This field is optionally present if this cell operates with shared spectrum channel access in FR2-2, Need R. Otherwise, it is absent, Need R.
conditional_presence_flags.LessThan5MHz: The field is mandatory present if the carrierBandwidth in SIB1 indicates UL or DL transmission bandwidth other than 15 PRB and the corresponding neighbour cell(s) support(s) 12 PRB, 15 PRB or 20 PRB transmission bandwidth configuration as defined in TS 38.101-1 [15], TS 38.211 [16] and TS 38.213 [13]. Otherwise, the field is optional, Need R.
conditional_presence_flags.RSRQ: The field is mandatory present if the threshServingLowQ is present in SIB2; otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.Segment1: The field is mandatory present in the first segment of SIB8, otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.GNSS-ID-SBAS: The field is mandatory present if gnss-id is set to sbas. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.MSG-1: The field is optionally present, Need R, if si-BroadcastStatus is set to notBroadcasting for any SI-message included in schedulingInfoList or any SI-message containing type1 SIB included in schedulingInfoList2. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.SUL-MSG-1: The field is optionally present, Need R, if supplementaryUplink is configured in ServingCellConfigCommonSIB and if si-BroadcastStatus is set to notBroadcasting for any SI-message included in schedulingInfoList or any SI-message containing type1 SIB included in schedulingInfoList2. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.REDCAP-MSG-1: The field is optionally present, Need R, if initialUplinkBWP-RedCap is configured in UplinkConfigCommonSIB and if si-BroadcastStatus is set to notBroadcasting for any SI-message included in schedulingInfoList or any SI-message containing type1 SIB included in schedulingInfoList2. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.LCH-Setup: The field is mandatory present upon creation of a new sidelink logical channel via the dedicated signalling and in case of sidelink DRB configuration via system information and pre-configuration; otherwise the field is optionally present, Need M.
conditional_presence_flags.LCH-SetupOnly: This field is mandatory present upon creation of a new sidelink logical channel via the dedicated signalling and in case of sidelink DRB configuration via system information and pre-configuration. Otherwise, it is absent, Need M.
conditional_presence_flags.SetupOtherBWP: The field is mandatory present upon configuration of a new UL BWP. The field is optionally present, Need M, otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.MeasObject-NCD-SSB: This field is optionally present, Need S, if nonCellDefiningSSB is configured in this DL BWP. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.PreConfigMG: The field is optionally present, Need R, if there is at least one per UE gap configured with preConfigInd or there is at least one per FR gap of the same FR which the SCell belongs to and configured with preConfigInd. It is absent, Need R, otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.ScellOnly: The field is optionally present, Need M, in the BWP-DownlinkDedicated of an Scell. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.SpCellOnly: The field is optionally present, Need R, in ServingCellConfigCommonSIB or in the ServingCellConfigCommon of an SpCell. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.Msg1Rep1: This field is optionally present, Need R, if the set(s) of Random Access resources with MSG1 repetition indication are configured in the BWP-UplinkCommon. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.Msg3Rep: This field is optionally present, Need S, if the set(s) of Random Access resources with MSG3 repetition indication are configured in the BWP-UplinkCommon. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.RA-PrioSliceAI: The field is optionally present in SIB1, Need R, if both parameters ra-PrioritizationForAccessIdentity and the ra-PrioritizationForSlicing/ra-PrioritizationForSlicingTwoStep are present in SIB1. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.SpCellOnly2: The field is optionally present, Need R, in ServingCellConfigCommon of an SpCell. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.2TA-Only: The field is optionally present, Need N in the BWP-UplinkCommon if additionalPCI-ToAddModList is present in ServingCellConfig and if tag2 is present in ServingCellConfig. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.NoTCI-PC: The field is mandatory present if unifiedTCI-StateType is configured for this serving cell and ul-powerControl is not configured for any UL TCI state or joint TCI state of this serving cell. Otherwise it is absent, Need R
conditional_presence_flags.2TA: This field is mandatory present if tag2 is present for the serving cell. It is absent, Need R, otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.Joint: This field is mandatory present, if unifiedTCI-StateType in the ltm-TCI-Info within LTM-Candidate is set to joint. It is absent, Need R, otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.Joint2: This field is mandatory present if unifiedTCI-StateType in the ltm-TCI-Info within LTM-Candidate is set to joint and ul-powerControl is not configured in any BWP-Uplink-Dedicated of the SpCellConfig in ltm-CandidateConfig. It is absent, Need R, otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.separateTCI: This field is mandatory present if unifiedTCI-StateType in the ltm-TCI-Info within LTM-Candidate is set to separate and ul-powerControl is not configured in any BWP-Uplink-Dedicated of the SpCellConfig in ltm-CandidateConfig. It is absent, Need R, otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.2Tx: The field is optionally present, Need R, if uplinkTxSwitching is configured; otherwise it is absent, Need R.
conditional_presence_flags.BWP-Reconfig: The field is optionally present, Need N, if the BWPs are reconfigured or if serving cells are added or removed. Otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.DirectToIndirect-PathSwitch: The field is mandatory present for the L2 U2N remote UE at path switch to the target L2 U2N Relay UE (including direct to indirect path switch and indirect to indirect path switch). It is absent otherwise.Note:    the target L2 U2N Relay UE should not be the same as serving L2 U2N Relay UE for inter-gNB indirect to indirect path switch.
conditional_presence_flags.MP: This field is optionally present, Need N, if a L2 U2N remote UE is configured to perform MP direct path addition during indirect-to-direct path swith procedure, or to perform MP direct path release during direct-to-indirect path switch procedure. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.NCR: This field is optionally present, Need M for NCR-MT. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.ReconfWithSync: The field is mandatory present in the RRCReconfiguration message:-    in each configured CellGroupConfig for which the SpCell changes,-    in the masterCellGroup:-    at change of AS security key derived from KgNB,-     in an RRCReconfiguration message contained in a DLInformationTransferMRDC message,-     path switch of L2 U2N remote UE to the target PCell,-     path switch of L2 U2N remote UE to the target L2 U2N Relay UE,-    in the secondaryCellGroup at:-    PSCell addition,-    SCG resume with NR-DC or (NG)EN-DC,-    update of required SI for PSCell,-    change of AS security key derived from S-KgNB in NR-DC while the UE is configured with at least one radio bearer with keyToUse set to secondary and that is not released by this RRCReconfiguration message,-    MN handover in (NG)EN-DC.Otherwise, it is optionally present, need M. The field is absent in the masterCellGroup in RRCResume and RRCSetup messages and is absent in the masterCellGroup in RRCReconfiguration messages if source configuration is not released during DAPS handover.
conditional_presence_flags.SCellAdd: The field is mandatory present upon SCell addition; otherwise it is absent, Need M.
conditional_presence_flags.SCellAddMod: The field is mandatory present upon SCell addition; otherwise it is optionally present, need M.
conditional_presence_flags.SCellAddSync: The field is optionally present, Need N:-     in the masterCellGroup at-    SCell addition,-    reconfiguration with sync,-    resume of an RRC connection.-    in the secondaryCellGroup, when the SCG is not indicated as deactivated at:-    SCG activation while the SCG was previously deactivated,-    SCell addition,-    reconfiguration with sync.It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.SCellSIB20-Opt: This field is optionally present, Need M, if the field sCellSIB20 is configured. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.SCG-Opt: The field is optionally present, Need M, in an SpCellConfig for the PSCell. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.condReconfigAdd: The field is mandatory present when a condReconfigId is being added. Otherwise the field is optional, need M.
conditional_presence_flags.condReconfigCHO-WithSCG: This field is optional present, need M, if the RRCReconfiguration message contained in corresponding condRRCReconfig includes the nr-SCG and condExecutionCond is configured. Otherwise, it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.CPAC: The field is optionally present, need M, when the conditional reconfiguration includes at least one candidate PSCell supporting subsequent CPAC. Otherwise, the field is absent, need R.
conditional_presence_flags.CHO: The field is optional present, Need R, if the UE is configured with at least a candidate SpCell for CHO. Otherwise the field is not present.
conditional_presence_flags.LCH-BasedPrioritization: This field is optionally present, Need R, if lch-BasedPrioritization is configured in the MAC entity. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.RACH-LessHO: The field is optionally present, Need N, if rach-LessHO is present in reconfigurationWithSync. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.RepTypeB: In pusch-TimeDomainAllocationListForMultiPUSCH-r16, the field is absent.In pusch-TimeDomainAllocationListDCI-0-1, the field is mandatory present if pusch-RepTypeIndicatorDCI-0-1 is set to pusch-RepTypeB. It is absent otherwise, Need R.In pusch-TimeDomainAllocationListDCI-0-2, the field is mandatory present if pusch-RepTypeIndicatorDCI-0-2 is set to pusch-RepTypeB. It is absent otherwise, Need R.
conditional_presence_flags.CG-List: The field is mandatory present when included in configuredGrantConfigToAddModList-r16, otherwise the field is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.CG-IndexMAC: The field is mandatory present if at least one configured grant is configured by configuredGrantConfigToAddModList-r16 in any BWP of this MAC entity, otherwise it is optionally present, need R.
conditional_presence_flags.CG-SDT1: This field is optionally present, Need R, if cg-SDT-Configuration is configured, otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.CG-SDT2: This field is optionally present, Need S, if cg-SDT-PeriodicityExt is configured, otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.LTM: The field is optionally present, Need R, in an LTM-Candidate IE. Otherwise, the field is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.SRSsets: This field is mandatory present when UE is configured with two SRS sets in either srs-ResourceSetToAddModList or srs-ResourceSetToAddModListDCI-0-2 with usage codebook or non-codebook and none of multipanelSchemeSDM or multipanelSchemeSFN or sTx-2Panel is configured. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.FollowUTCI: The field is optionally present, Need R, if the field followUnifiedTCI-StateSRS is present. Otherwise, it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.NotSIB-initialBWP: The field is absent in SIB1/SIB20 and in the PDCCH-ConfigCommon of the initial BWP in ServingCellConfigCommon, if SIB1/SIB20 is broadcasted. Otherwise, it is optionally present, Need N.
conditional_presence_flags.CIF-PRESENCE: The field is mandatory present if the cif-Presence is set to true. The field is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.Aperiodic: The field is mandatory present if the NZP-CSI-RS-Resources in the associated resourceSet have the resourceType aperiodic and unifiedTCI-StateType is not configured. The field is optionally present, Need R, if the NZP-CSI-RS-Resources in the associated resourceSet have the resourceType aperiodic and unifiedTCI-StateType is configured. The field is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.ApplyIndicatedTCI: The field is optionally present, need R, if resourceForChannel has aperiodic CSI-RS and unifiedTCI-StateType is configured. This field is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.CSI-IM-ForInterference: This field is mandatory present if the CSI-ReportConfig identified by reportConfigId is configured with csi-IM-ResourcesForInterference; otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.NZP-CSI-RS-ForInterference: This field is mandatory present if the CSI-ReportConfig identified by reportConfigId is configured with nzp-CSI-RS-ResourcesForInterference; otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.SecondCSICMR: This field is mandatory present if resourcesForChannel2 is configured with aperiodic CSI-RS and applyIndicatedTCI-State is configured. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.TDCP: This field is absent if resourcesForChannel2 is configured. It is optionally present, Need R, otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.PeriodicOrSemiPersistent: The field is optionally present, Need M, for periodic and semi-persistent ZP-CSI-RS-Resources (as indicated in PDSCH-Config). The field is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.MultiType: The field is mandatory present when the UE reports its capability on supporting multiple="multiple" processing types, otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.MultiState: The field is mandatory present when the UE reports its capability on supporting option 1 or option 2 for the configured type, otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.InterFreqHOAndServCellAdd: This field is mandatory present for inter-frequency handover and upon serving cell (PSCell/SCell) addition. Otherwise, the field is optionally present, Need M.
conditional_presence_flags.ServCellAdd: This field is mandatory present upon serving cell addition (for PSCell and SCell) and upon handover from E-UTRA to NR. It is optionally present, Need M otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.L139: The field is mandatory present if prach-RootSequenceIndex L=139, or if L=571 for FR2-2, otherwise the field is absent, Need S.
conditional_presence_flags.TDD: The field is optionally present, Need R, for TDD cells; otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.MsgAConfigCommon: The field is optionally present, Need S, if FeatureCombinationPreambles is included in RACH-ConfigCommonTwoStepRA. Otherwise, it is absent. If the field is absent in FeatureCombinationPreambles included in RACH-ConfigCommonTwoStepRA, the UE applies MsgA-PUSCH-Config included in the corresponding MsgA-ConfigCommon.
conditional_presence_flags.Msg1Rep2: The field is mandatory present, if msg1-Repetitions is included in FeatureCombination for this concerned FeatureCombinationPreambles. Otherwise, it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.Msg1Rep3: The field is optionally present, Need S, if msg1-Repetitions is included in FeatureCombination for this concerned FeatureCombinationPreambles. Otherwise, it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.SpCellAdd: The field is mandatory present if this FrequencyInfoDL is for SpCell. Otherwise the field is optionally present, Need S.
conditional_presence_flags.SSBlessSCell: The field is optionally present, Need S, if the inter-band SSB-less SCell is configured for this cell and absoluteFrequencySSB is absent. It is absent otherwise, Need R.
conditional_presence_flags.FDD-OrSUL-OrEarlyUL-Sync: The field is mandatory present if this FrequencyInfoUL is for the paired UL for a DL (defined in a FrequencyInfoDL), if this FrequencyInfoUL is for a supplementary uplink (SUL), or if this FrequencyInfoUL is configured within EarlyUL-SyncConfig. It is absent, Need R, otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.FDD-TDD-OrSUL-Optional: The field is optionally present, Need R, if this FrequencyInfoUL-SIB is for the paired UL for a DL (defined in a FrequencyInfoDL-SIB), or if this FrequencyInfoUL-SIB is for an unpaired UL (TDD) in certain bands (as defined in clause 5.4.2.1 of TS 38.101-1 and in clause 5.4.2.1 of TS 38.104 [12]), or if this FrequencyInfoUL-SIB is for a supplementary uplink (SUL). It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.FDD-OrSUL: The field is mandatory present if this FrequencyInfoUL-SIB is for the paired UL for a DL (defined in a FrequencyInfoDL-SIB) or if this FrequencyInfoUL-SIB is for a supplementary uplink (SUL). It is absent otherwise (if this FrequencyInfoUL-SIB is for an unpaired UL (TDD).
conditional_presence_flags.SCellOnly: This field is optionally present, Need R, for SCells. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.PDCP-CADuplication: The field is mandatory present if the DRB/SRB associated with this logical channel is configured with PDCP CA duplication in UL in the cell group in which this IE is included (i.e. the PDCP entity is associated with multiple="multiple" RLC entities belonging to this cell group). Otherwise the field is optionally present, need R.
conditional_presence_flags.UL: Specification of the conditions for including the field associated with the condition tag = "UL". Semantics in case of optional presence under certain conditions may also be specified.
conditional_presence_flags.CRS-IM: For the serving cell with 15kHz SCS, this field is mandatory present for the UE supporting the capability of crs-IM-nonDSS-NWA-15kHzSCS-r17, but not supporting crs-IM-nonDSS-15kHzSCS-r17, if RateMatchPatternLTE-CRS is not configured for this serving cell. Otherwise it is optionally present, Need S if RateMatchPatternLTE-CRS is configured for this serving cell; Need M otherwise.For the serving cell with 30kHz SCS, this field is mandatory present for the UE supporting the capability of crs-IM-nonDSS-NWA-30kHzSCS-r17, but not supporting crs-IM-nonDSS-30kHzSCS-r17, if RateMatchPatternLTE-CRS is not configured for this serving cell. Otherwise it is optionally present, Need S if RateMatchPatternLTE-CRS is configured for this serving cell; Need M otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.NotCellID: If the field neighCellId is present, this field shall be absent; otherwise, it is optionally present if the IE LTE-NeighCellsCRS-AssistInfoList contains one list entry, Need S, or it is mandatory present if the IE LTE-NeighCellsCRS-AssistInfoList contains multiple="multiple" list entries.
conditional_presence_flags.LTM-MCG: This field is optional present for the MCG, Need R, if the UE is configured with at least an LTM candidate configuration associated to the MCG. Otherwise, the field absent.
conditional_presence_flags.G-RNTI: The field is optionally present, Need R, if g-RNTI is included. Otherwise, it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.HARQFeedback: The field is mandatory present if HARQ feedback is enabled for a G-RNTI/G-CS-RNTI associated with this DRX configuration. It is optionally present. Need R, otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.MCG-Only: This field is optionally present, Need R, in the PhysicalCellGroupConfig of the MCG. It is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.LCH-PrioWithReTxTimer: This field is optionally present, Need R, if lch-BasedPrioritization-r16 is configured in this MAC entity and cg-RetransmissionTimer-r16 is configured for any configured grant configuration associated with this MAC entity. It is absent otherwise, Need R.
conditional_presence_flags.AsyncCA: This field is mandatory present when configuring FR2 UL gap pattern to UE in:- (NG)EN-DC, NR SA, NE-DC or NR-DC without FR2-FR2 band combination, with asynchronous CA involving FR2 carriers.Otherwise, it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.NEDCorNRDC: This field is mandatory present when configuring and reconfiguring gap pattern to UE in NE-DC or NR-DC. Otherwise, it is absent, Need R.
conditional_presence_flags.AssociatedGapCSIRS: This field is optionally present, Need R if associatedMeasGapCSIRS is configured, otherwise, it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.AssociatedGapSSB: This field is optionally present, Need R if associatedMeasGapSSB is configured, otherwise, it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.CSI-RS: This field is mandatory present if csi-rs-ResourceConfigMobility is configured, otherwise, it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.IntraFreqConnected: This field is optionally present, Need R if the UE is configured with a serving cell for which (absoluteFrequencySSB, subcarrierSpacing) in ServingCellConfigCommon is equal to (ssbFrequency, ssbSubcarrierSpacing) in this MeasObjectNR, otherwise, it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.NeighbourCell: This field is mandatory present if this MeasObject is configured by the serving cell for a neighbour cell served by a NTN Earth-moving cell and is associated with a ReportConfig which contains EventD2 or condEventD2. Otherwise, it is optional, Need R.
conditional_presence_flags.SSBorAssociatedSSB: This field is mandatory present if ssb-ConfigMobility is configured or associatedSSB is configured in at least one cell. Otherwise, it is absent, Need R.
conditional_presence_flags.SSBorAssociatedSSB2: If the measObject is associated to an SCell with SSB, this field is mandatory present if ssb-ConfigMobility is configured or associatedSSB is configured in at least one cell.If the measObject is associated to an SSB-less SCell, this field is optionally present, Need R, if ssb-ConfigMobility is configured or associatedSSB is configured in at least one cell.If ssb-ConfigMobility is not configured and associatedSSB is not configured for any cell, the field is absent, Need R.
conditional_presence_flags.InitialBWPConfig: The field is mandatory present when MsgA-ConfigCommon is configured for the initial uplink BWP, or when MsgA-ConfigCommon is configured for a non-initial uplink BWP and MsgA-ConfigCommon is not configured for the initial uplink BWP, otherwise the field is optionally present, Need S.
conditional_presence_flags.FreqHopConfigured: This field is mandatory present when the field msgA-IntraSlotFrequencyHopping is configured. Otherwise, the field is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.GroupBConfigured: The field is mandatory present if groupB-ConfiguredTwoStepRA is configured in RACH-ConfigCommonTwoStepRA, otherwise the field is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.OptULNotSIB2: The field is absent for SIB2 and is mandatory present if the parent IE is included in SIB4 or frequencyInfoDL-SIB. Otherwise, if the field is absent in frequencyInfoUL-SIB in UplinkConfigCommonSIB, the UE will use the frequency band indicated in frequencyInfoDL-SIB in DownlinkConfigCommonSIB.
conditional_presence_flags.aperiodic: This field is mandatory present in case of aperiodic MUSIM gap configuration. Otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.gapSetup: The field is mandatory present upon configuration of a new MUSIM gap. The field is optionally present, Need M, otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.periodic: This field is mandatory present in case of periodic MUSIM gap configuration. Otherwise it is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.SIB19: The field is mandatory present for the serving cell in SIB19. The field is optionally present, Need R, otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.Periodic: The field is optionally present, Need M, for periodic NZP-CSI-RS-Resources (as indicated in CSI-ResourceConfig). The field is absent otherwise.
conditional_presence_flags.RS-SSB: The field is optionally present, Need R, if ssb-Index is configured for referenceSignal. Otherwise it is absent, Need R.
conditional_presence_flags.InitialBWP-Only: This field is optionally present, Need R, if this BWP is the initial BWP of SpCell. Otherwise, the field is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.InitialBWP-Paging: This field is optionally present, Need R, if this BWP is the initialDownlinkBWP or initialDownlinkBWP-RedCap including CD-SSB and the entire CORESET#0, and pei-Config is configured in DownlinkConfigCommonSIB. Otherwise, this field is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.OtherBWP: This field is optionally present, Need R, if this BWP is not the initialDownlinkBWP and pagingSearchSpace is configured in this BWP. Otherwise this field is absent.
conditional_presence_flags.DRB: This field is mandatory present when the corresponding DRB/multicast MRB is being set up, absent for SRBs. Otherwise this field is optionally present, need M.
conditional_presence_flags.DRB2: This field is optionally present in case of DRB, need M. Otherwise, it is absent for SRBs and MRBs.
conditional_presence_flags.Drb-Duplication: For SRBs, this field is absent. For DRBs, this field is absent if duplication is not configured. Otherwise, this field is optional, need R.
conditional_presence_flags.MoreThanOneRLC: This field is mandatory present upon RRC reconfiguration with setup of a PDCP entity for a radio bearer (except for multicast MRB) with more than one associated logical channel and upon RRC reconfiguration with the association of additional logical channels to the PDCP entity.The field is also mandatory present in case the field moreThanTwoRLC-DRB is included in PDCP-Config.Upon RRC reconfiguration when a PDCP entity is associated with multiple="multiple" logical channels, this field is optionally present need M. Otherwise, this field is absent. Need R.
